channel.title: How a bot perform sql communication with web c&c?
channel.description: Hi, I'm searching for some project of a botnet or a simple bot+web panel where I can learn how a bot can communicate with a web c&c server. I know C and SQL, can you suggest me a starting point and some open source basic, well written and not very old projects where I can study? Thank you

item.title: How a bot perform sql communication with web c&c?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: How a bot perform sql communication with web c&c?
